TITLE: Web Components -- Hello World
DESCRIPTION: A simple hello world example with as little stuff in it as possible
DETAILS: This is a basic example 'Hello, World' example of web components. Some of the examples I've seen make it look much more complicated than it really is.
The example below is built directly from the HTML and JavaScript code snippets that follow
